column17:
Adidas Terrace Casual Luxury Sneakers - G31799 SIZE-7:
Adidas presents this black terrace casual sneakers which not only ensures stylish look but also provides utmost comfort. This pair of shoes can be worn with jeans and T-shirts while going for a stroll in the evening. The upper material used in this pair of shoes is synthetic and the inner sole is made of non-leather material to ensure comfort. The out-soles are made of rubber and has flat heels to provide wearing comfort.
